synopsis.text: In the heart of a grand kingdom, Jill, a noblewoman once betrothed to the crown prince, finds herself on the wrong side of the blade, sentenced to death by her own fianc√©. But as fate would have it, she is whisked back in time to the very party where her ill-fated engagement was announced. Desperate to alter her destiny, Jill impulsively proposes to the man standing behind her, only to discover it's Emperor Hadis, her sworn enemy! Aware of his future transformation into a ruthless tyrant, Jill attempts to retract her proposal. However, the charmed Hadis sweeps her off to his castle, where a simple meal sways her heart. Seizing this chance to change both their destinies, Jill vows to prevent Hadis' descent into darkness and instead, fill his life with happiness. Brace yourself for a thrilling journey as Jill navigates her past, present, and future with the very enemy she once feared!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
